about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure to save a dying planet in Raccoon King, an action-adventure game filled with danger and intrigue. Customize your raccoon king with new abilities and tools using a skill tree, and collect a variety of different types of trash to clean up the planet. With a beautiful world filled with unique challenges and obstacles, Raccoon King is sure to provide an immersive and engaging experience.

Coming soon with Multiplayer!
In addition to the single-player mode, Raccoon King also features a multiplayer mode where you can compete or cooperate with others to collect trash and save the planet. Encounter a wide variety of enemies, including toxic creatures and hostile robots, as well as challenging obstacles like quicksand and lava pits. Environmental effects like rain and wind add an extra layer of challenge, making each level unique and exciting.

Are you ready?
Uncover ancient secrets and uncover the past of the planet's lost civilization as you explore the world and collect artifacts. With beautiful graphics, immersive gameplay, and a compelling story, Raccoon King is a must-play for fans of action-adventure games. Are you ready to join the fight and save the planet?

content_descriptors.notes: May be disturbing because it features some of the blood- and gore-effects and explosions.

name: Larimar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 650
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9
  • Graphics: GTX 1080

short_description: Clean up the planet, dodge meteors, and uncover ancient secrets in this action-adventure game! Customize your raccoon king with new abilities and compete or cooperate with others in multiplayer. Explore a vast and beautiful world filled with danger and mystery, and join the fight to save the planet!
